episodes.title: The Zion Society Cult: The Secret, Evil Life of a Suburban Grandpa | Dark History Documentary
episodes.description:
The Zion Society Cult: The Secret, Evil Life of a Suburban Grandpa | Dark History Documentary

This is the story of one of the most disturbing hidden cults in American history — not because it formed in isolation, but because it operated inside a quiet suburban neighborhood in Utah. The Zion Society was built by a smiling, soft-spoken grandfather who everyone believed was harmless. Behind white picket fences, ordinary family homes were transformed into a covert system of control, obedience, and manipulation. In 1991, when Utah officers finally raided this suburban block, they expected a small crime ring — instead they uncovered a secret empire built in daylight. This documentary exposes how trust, faith, and community were weaponized against the very people who believed they were safe.

Comment your time + location below, subscribe for more Dark History, and prepare yourself — this is the Zion Society exposed.

#ZionSociety #darkhistory #suburbansecrets #CultExposed #hiddenevil  #utahhistory #historicalmystery #americangothic #psychologicalhorror
